title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Education
body: Lassen: A Wild Classroom Volcanic domes, alpine lakes, over 30 feet of snowfall - Lassen holds adventure for your students. Find lesson plans, plan your field trip, and discover park resources you can borrow as you use Lassen as your classroom. Read More                 Plan Your Visit Find information to help you plan your visit to Lassen including self-guided activities and safety information. Read More
